Eclipse PDE
2022-06 (4.24)
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.eclipse.pde.core.target

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.pde.core.target 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.pde.core.target
    Application programming interfaces to access and modify the PDE target platform.
    org.eclipse.pde.ui.target
    Application programming interfaces describing UI elements that can be contributed to PDE target platform support.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.pde.core.target used by org.eclipse.pde.core.target 
    Class Description
    ITargetDefinition
    Defines a target platform.
    ITargetHandle
    A handle to a target definition.
    ITargetLocation
    Describes a location in a target that provides bundles and features.
    NameVersionDescriptor
    Describes something with a name and version.
    TargetBundle
    Describes a single bundle in a target definition.
    TargetFeature
    Describes a single feature in a target definition.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.pde.core.target used by org.eclipse.pde.ui.target 
    Class Description
    ITargetDefinition
    Defines a target platform.
    ITargetLocation
    Describes a location in a target that provides bundles and features.
